output_list.criticism: The function developer_Coin_Character is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the Coin_Character variable.
The function developer_new_address_for_funds is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the funds variable.
The function developer_add_Exchanges is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the Exchanges variable.
The function developer_add_cost_of_transfers is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the cost_of_transfers variable.
The function developer_new_price is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the price variable.
The function developer_crowdsale_text is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the crowdsale variable.
The function developer_new_symbol is public and can be called by anyone. This could lead to unauthorized modification of the symbol variable.

The fallback function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks. It allows anyone to call the function and transfer Ether to the contract, which can lead to unauthorized modification of the contract's state.
